testcase.name: jdk7::config::alternatives Debian on operatingsystem Debian should contain Exec[java alternatives java] with command => "update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/java java /usr/java/jdk1.7.0_51/jdk1.7.0_51/bin/java 18000", unless => "update-alternatives --display java | /bin/grep jdk1.7.0_51 | /bin/grep 'priority 18000$'" and user => "root"
